value: A bipartite network of languages and the countries in which they are spoken, as estimated by Unicode. Edges are weighted by the proportion of the given country's population that is literate in a particular language.

code:  UL
name:  Unicode languages
url:  http://www.unicode.org/cldr/charts/25/supplemental/territory_language_information.html
category:  Feature
description:  Country–language distribution
long-description:  This bipartite network denotes which languages are spoken in which countries.  Nodes are countries and languages; edge weights denote the proportion (between zero and one) of the population of a given country speaking a given language.  To quote the Unicode data description:  \The main goal is to provide approximate figures for the literate
column3: functional population for each language in each territory: that is
column4: the population that is able to read and write each language
column5: and is comfortable enough to use it with computers.\"

value: part of the Koblenz Network Collection

# prop_name: This directory contains the TSV and related files of the unicodelang network: This bipartite network denotes which languages are spoken in which countries.  Nodes are countries and languages; edge weights denote the proportion (between zero and one) of the population of a given country speaking a given language.  To quote the Unicode data description:  \"The main goal is to provide approximate figures for the literate
value: functional population for each language in each territory: that is
column3: the population that is able to read and write each language
column4: and is comfortable enough to use it with computers.\"

# prop_name: More information about the network is provided here:
out.unicodelang -- The adjacency matrix of the network in whitespace-separated values format
The meaning of the columns in out.unicodelang are:
First column: ID of from node
Second column: ID of to node
Third column (if present): weight or multiplicity of edge
Fourth column (if present):  timestamp of edges Unix time
ent.unicodelang.language.code -- Contains the attribute `code` of entity `language` of the network
ent.unicodelang.coutry.code -- Contains the attribute `code` of entity `coutry` of the network
